column1:
A
 low-pressure area formed over East-Central Bay of Bengal and adjoining north Andaman sea
at 0000 UTC of today, the 21st October 2024. it is very likely to move West-Northwestwards
and intensify into a depression around 0000 UTC of 22nd October and into a cyclonic storm by
23rd  October,  2024  over  East-central  Bay  of  Bengal.  Thereafter,  it  is  very  likely  to  move
northwestwards  and  reach  northwest  Bay  of  Bengal  off  Odisha-West Bengal  coasts  by  24th
